Package zuul.pkg_ui

Interface UserInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Console, ZuulController
    public interface UserInterface
    This interface represents all the constraints that a class must integrate to be the Graphical User Interface (GUI).
    Version:
    06.04.21
    Author:
    Corentin POUPRY

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String ask​(String title, String question)
      Asks a question to the user throughout the GUI.
      void close()
      Causes the interface to terminate.
      void disable()
      Disables the GUI.
      void print​(String s)
      Prints a string.
      void printf​(String format, Object... args)
      A convenience method to write a formatted string to the interface using the specified format string and arguments.
      void println()
      Terminates the current line by writing the line separator string.
      void println​(String s)
      Prints a String and then terminate the line.

    • Method Detail

      • ask

        String ask​(String title,
           String question)
        Asks a question to the user throughout the GUI.
        Parameters:
        title - The question title.
        question - The question asked.
        Returns:
        The answer of the user.

      • print

        void print​(String s)
        Prints a string.
        Parameters:
        s - The String to be printed

      • println

        void println()
        Terminates the current line by writing the line separator string. The line separator string is defined by the system property line.separator, and is not necessarily a single newline character ('\n').

      • println

        void println​(String s)
        Prints a String and then terminate the line.
        Parameters:
        s - The text to be printed.

      • printf

        void printf​(String format,
            Object... args)
        A convenience method to write a formatted string to the interface using the specified format string and arguments.
        Parameters:
        format - A format string as described in Format string syntax
        args - Arguments referenced by the format specifiers in the format string.

      • close

        void close()
        Causes the interface to terminate.

      • disable

        void disable()
        Disables the GUI.
